channel.title: Quick prem question
channel.description: Hey guys i have it so normal players arent premium and if ur staff or the owner u are... But when i go to the char file to make the (New PLAYER) a prem the ismember is already 1 how do i make that be 0 when a new comer logs on it is 0.... And i have to change to 1 for them to be premium.

item.title: Quick prem question
item.dc:creator: @boxhad boxhad
item.description:
@boxhad wrote:

That didnt work ( I DIDNT CHANGE ALL THE PREMIUM 2 MEMBER I DONT SEE THAT HELPING).

Read full topic

item.title: Quick prem question
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

boxhad:

Hmmm what u mean? i didnt change it all to normal members yet.

change from 1 to 0, compile, run your server and check if it answers your question.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick prem question
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

boxhad:

Because if i dont change the it auto says thier premium no matter what.

why not just delete premium and use member? and change everything u made premium to member…

it will be alot easier and less confussing.

item.title: Quick prem question
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“boxhad, post:15, topic:311292”]// root admin
premium = true;
break;
case 3:
// regular admin
premium = true;
break;
case 2:
// global mod
premium = true;
break;
case 1:
// player moderator
premium = true;
break;
case 4:
// just premium
premium = true;
break;
default:
// playerismember = 0;
premium = false; // true; //(OWNERS NAME HERE
break;

And other one…

// Setting Welcomescreen information
Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH);
int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR);
int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day);
playerLastLogin = calc;
playerLastConnect = “”;
playerIsMember = 0;
playerMessages = 0;

	// Setting player standard look
	playerLook[0] = 2;
	playerLook[1] = 6;
	playerLook[2] = 7;
	playerLook[3] = 10;
	playerLook[4] = 5;
	playerLook[5] = 0;[/quote]

i think thats alright…

Read full topic

item.title: Quick prem question
item.dc:creator: @boxhad boxhad
item.description:
@boxhad wrote:

// root admin
premium = true;
break;
case 3:
// regular admin
premium = true;
break;
case 2:
// global mod
premium = true;
break;
case 1:
// player moderator
premium = true;
break;
case 4:
// just premium
premium = true;
break;
default:
// playerismember = 0;
premium = false; // true; //(OWNERS NAME HERE
break;

And other one…

// Setting Welcomescreen information
Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH);
int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR);
int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day);
playerLastLogin = calc;
playerLastConnect = “”;
playerIsMember = 0;
playerMessages = 0;

	// Setting player standard look
	playerLook[0] = 2;
	playerLook[1] = 6;
	playerLook[2] = 7;
	playerLook[3] = 10;
	playerLook[4] = 5;
	playerLook[5] = 0;

Read full topic
